replies.body:
##Hate speech is more than "a little negative."

There is no situation in which the word censored by the boards is appropriate to say during a game. Riot has a zero-tolerance policy for that sort of hate speech, and it will earn a 14-day ban on the first offense.

KruzerZ: %%%gots lol
KruzerZ: %%%got

That's exactly why.

But we're still talking about 1 game out of 10000000000 games where i just said 2 words (hate speech) you can't give me an instant judgement just for that? THey should be looking more at have this person been toxic or said any kind of hate speech last game or the past 10 games. that's where they can judge clearly on what kind of punishment should the person get.
Or Riot has said they have 0 tolerance for hate speech and you got the correct punishment considering they've had this discussion many times on the boards and made it very clear this is what happens.

Feel like 7-day suspension would be more correct than 14 days xd

Well sadly i don't follow the boards they could atleast find a way to contact everybody about the ''0 tolerance for hate speech''
I think part of the point of hate speech is that it shouldn’t need a warning. Like, it’s generally understood that it’s inappropriate in 100% of situations.

I mean if you want to make the insults at least do research into what could happen if you get in trouble.


Also the punishments follow 10 game chat->25 game chat restrict -> 14 day ban -> perma.

So the next punishment regardless how small it is will basically be a guaranteed perma and when your 14 day ends you will be immediately on thin ice.

So now you know for when your suspension ends.
there is a zero tolerance policy against hate speech. Due to the severity of this, it can easily skip punishment tiers.
you're using homophobic slurs which got you an instant ban
